ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISCHANGED( LastActivityDate )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Activity_Type__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Date_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Subject_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Type_Account__c ) )) && (TEXT(Prospect_Status__c)='5 - Closing in on Commitment' || TEXT(Prospect_Status__c)='6 - Contract Review/ Invoiced') && (ISBLANK( Potential_Number_of_Contractors__c ))
